StringTable.Label: Quest_DerelictMiningDrone_Name
StringTable.String: Derelict Mining Drone

StringTable.Label: Quest_DerelictMiningDrone_Dec
StringTable.String: Our flagship finds a derelict mining drone, drifting aimlessly in space. The drone appears to be from an advanced civilization and is still functional. Your engineers manage to reprogram and repair the drone. Upon confirmation, the drone is added your fleet, providing increased mining capabilities and efficiency for resource gathering.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DerelictMiningDrone_Pragmatism_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Reprogram the drone to enhance general resource gathering capabilities.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DerelictMiningDrone_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Reprogram the drone to focus on gathering Durantium.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CelestialArtExhibition_Name
StringTable.String: Celestial Art Exhibition

StringTable.Label: Quest_CelestialArtExhibition_Desc
StringTable.String: Our flagship encounters an awe-inspiring celestial phenomenon that seems to be a form of cosmic art created by an unknown species. The vivid display of colors and patterns has a profound impact on the crew and sparks a wave of creativity throughout the civilization. Upon confirmation, your civilization gains a one-time culture boost, which could help with diplomacy and influence.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CelestialArtExhibition_Pragmatism_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Embrace the cosmic inspiration giving our worlds additional influence.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AbandonedResearchOutpost_Name
StringTable.String: Abandoned Research Outpost

StringTable.Label: Quest_AbandonedResearchOutpost_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship has discovered an abandoned research outpost in deep space. The outpost appears to have been deserted for quite some time, but the advanced technology inside is still in working condition.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AbandonedResearchOutpost_Investigate_Name
StringTable.String: Investigate the outpost and retrieve the valuable scientific data.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArtifactJoyOrResource_Name
StringTable.String: Artifact of Joy and Resources

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArtifactJoyOrResource_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship discovers an ancient artifact, a mysterious object imbued with immense power. This artifact can either be harnessed to provide a massive energy spike for our Shipyards or used to generate an aura of euphoria on a target planet, uplifting the mood of its inhabitants and providing a temporary boost to productivity.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArtifactJoyOrResource_Pragmatism_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Channel the artifact's energy to temporarily enhance manufacturing on our worlds.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArtifactJoyOrResource_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Secure the artifact in the vault for later use.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrecursorArtifactCache_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Artifact Cache

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrecursorArtifactCache_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship locates a hidden cache of Precursor artifacts, left behind by the ancient civilization. These artifacts are not only valuable but also hold clues to the advanced technologies of the Precursors.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrecursorArtifactCache_Pragmatism_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Extract resources from the artifacts.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrecursorArtifactCache_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Add the artifact into the vault.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MysteriousEnergySource_Name
StringTable.String: Mysterious Energy Source

StringTable.Label: Quest_MysteriousEnergySource_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship detects an unusual energy signature coming from a nearby asteroid. Upon investigation, the crew finds a stable and potent energy source that can be harnessed to enhanced the manufacturing of our planets.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MysteriousEnergySource_Pragmatism_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Utilize the energy source to temporarily increase manufacturing on our worlds.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostCargoContainer_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Cargo Container

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostCargoContainer_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship comes across a drifting cargo container, seemingly abandoned and adrift in space for years. The container is filled with valuable trade goods and rare resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_LostCargoContainer_Bonus_Stat_0X56CD
StringTable.String: Lost cargo booty.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostCargoContainer_Pragmatism_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Acquire the valuable goods to boost your economy for many months.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientStarMap_Name
StringTable.String: Ancient Star Map

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientStarMap_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship discovers an ancient star map etched into the surface of a seemingly insignificant moon. The map reveals that there is a very valuable relatively close to our current location.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientStarMap_Pragmatism_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Seek out the high quality planet in a nearby star system.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AutomatedRepairStation_Name
StringTable.String: Automated Repair Station

StringTable.Label: Quest_AutomatedRepairStation_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship encounters an automated repair station left behind by a long-lost civilization. Despite its age, the station is still operational and capable of repairing and upgrading ships.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AutomatedRepairStation_Pragmatism_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Receive free repairs and a one-time upgrade to your starship's weapons, defenses, or engines, improving its combat or exploration capabilities.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnigmaticMonolith_Name
StringTable.String: Enigmatic Monolith

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnigmaticMonolith_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship discovers an enigmatic monolith floating in space, emitting a mysterious energy that seems to resonate with the crew's thoughts. Studying the monolith provides a temporary boost to the crew's problem-solving abilities.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnigmaticMonolith_Pragmatism_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Gain a one-time burst of knowledge.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostExplorersLog_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Explorer's Log

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostExplorersLog_Dec
StringTable.String: Our flagship finds the remains of a long-lost explorer's vessel, along with a detailed log of their discoveries. This log contains invaluable information on various planets, anomalies, and points of interest throughout the galaxy. Upon confirmation, your civilization finds a previously unknown world available to be settled on.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostExplorersLog_Pragmatism_Name
StringTable.String: Use the log to chart new paths.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GhostFleet_Equality_Name
StringTable.String: Salvage resources from the wreckage.

StringTable.Label: Quest_WreckageOfTheTitan_Name
StringTable.String: Wreckage of the Titan

StringTable.Label: Quest_WreckageOfTheTitan_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship discovers that the artifact contains a key that summons the remains of a massive battlecruiser, the Titan, once the flagship of an ancient and powerful armada. While too ancient to use directly, our scientists are quick to track down potentially useful knowledge from it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_WreckageOfTheTitan_Pragmatism_Name
StringTable.String: Discover new technologies from wreckage.

StringTable.Label: Quest_WreckageOfTheTitan_Equality_Name
StringTable.String: Salvage and recruit a mercenary ship.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact_Name
StringTable.String: Mapping Artifact

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact_Dec
StringTable.String: During the thorough analysis of the artifact, your research team has unearthed an astonishing discovery - it is a reservoir of colossal energy. The scientists in your crew are confident that they can channel this raw power to propel our civilization forward. Yet, a dissenting perspective suggests that this energy could be utilized as a cosmic key, opening up uncharted dimensions of the cosmos, and revealing secrets of space hitherto unknown.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact_Choice_1
StringTable.String: Harvest the artifact's energy and gain a valuable resource.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact_Choice_2_0x43b
StringTable.String: Store the artifact in the vault.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact2_Name
StringTable.String: The Ancient Artifact

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact2_Dec
StringTable.String: Your fleet stumbles upon an ancient artifact floating in the depths of space. Its origin is unknown. It is made of the strange metal our scientists call Durantium. The purpose of this artifact is lost to time but we can still make use of its raw materials.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact2_Choice_1
StringTable.String: Harvest the artifact's power and gain a valuable resource.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact2_Choice_2
StringTable.String: Use the artifact's power to create a new world for all to share.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact3_Name
StringTable.String: The Ancient Artifact

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact3_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship arrives at the strange artifact. What it once did can only be known to the ancient Precursors. However, within the depths of it is a container holding valuable Antimatter. Your crew carefully remove the Antimatter and put it into storage for later use.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact3_Choice_1
StringTable.String: Extract the energy from the artifact and convert it into valuable Antimatter for our use.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact3_Choice_2
StringTable.String: Release the ancient civilization, known as The Ecliptae, from the artifact and allow them to live among the stars once again.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceMonsterCage_Name_0X1F4DE
StringTable.String: Encounter with the Monstrous Cage

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceMonsterCage_Desc_0X1F4DE
StringTable.String: Our ship has stumbled upon a peculiar artifact adrift in the cold void of space. It appears to be a cage, but not for any ordinary creature. This containment unit was designed for something... monstrous. We have two clear options: keep the artifact and possibly unleash the beast at a strategic moment, or study the cage's advanced technology, risking the inadvertent release of the captive creature.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceMonsterCage_Keep_Name_0X1F4DE
StringTable.String: Keep the artifact. This monster might serve a purpose.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceMonsterCage_Keep_Desc_0X1F4DE
StringTable.String: Take the cage into our possession, ready to release the monster when needed.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceMonsterCage_Experiment_Name_0X1F4DE
StringTable.String: Study the cage's technology. We can deal with the monster.

StringTable.Label: Event_SpaceMonsterCage_Experiment_Desc_0X1F4DE
StringTable.String: Dissect the artifact for its advanced technology, advancing our own scientific knowledge in the current research topic. This may haunt us later.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorIntegrityDevice_Name_0X1F5C3
StringTable.String: Unearthed Arnorian Integrity Device

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorIntegrityDevice_Desc_0X1F5C3
StringTable.String: An intriguing discovery has been made - a device from the long-gone Arnor civilization. Its structure suggests it might be used to enhance the structural integrity of our fleet. Alternatively, its exotic materials could fetch a good price on the interstellar market.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorIntegrityDevice_Bonus_Name_0X1F5C3
StringTable.String: Preserve and Utilize

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorIntegrityDevice_Bonus_Desc_0X1F5C3
StringTable.String: Add the artifact to our vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorIntegrityDevice_Disassemble_Name_0X1F5C3
StringTable.String: Dismantle and Trade

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorIntegrityDevice_Disassemble_Effect_Desc_0X1F5C3
StringTable.String: Disassemble the artifact and sell the resulting materials on the market for a substantial amount of credits.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorTerraformer_Name_0X1F4E0
StringTable.String: Precursor Terraforming Device

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorTerraformer_Desc_0X1F4E0
StringTable.String: Our flagship has discovered an artifact of the ancient Precursors. It appears to be a device of terraforming capabilities, seemingly able to upgrade a planet's class by an entire level. We could store it for future use or dismantle it to obtain valuable resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorTerraformer_Bonus_Name_0X1F4E0
StringTable.String: Secure the Artifact

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorTerraformer_Bonus_Desc_0X1F4E0
StringTable.String: Store the artifact in our vault for potential future terraforming purposes.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorTerraformer_Disassemble_Name_0X1F4E0
StringTable.String: Harvest its Resources

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorTerraformer_Disassemble_Effect_Desc_0X1F4E0
StringTable.String: Dismantle the artifact and sell the extracted resources on the interstellar market.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadLordWeapon_Name_0X1F5E0
StringTable.String: The Dread Lord's Harbinger

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadLordWeapon_Desc_0X1F5E0
StringTable.String: Our flagship has discovered an artifact, suspected to be of Dread Lord origin. It's a weapon of terrifying power, able to instantly damage an entire enemy fleet. We must decide whether to preserve it for potential usage or dismantle it for valuable resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadLordWeapon_Bonus_Name_0X1F5E0
StringTable.String: Secure the weapon artifact.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadLordWeapon_Bonus_Desc_0X1F5E0
StringTable.String: Keep the artifact in our vault, harnessing its potential to damage enemy fleets when needed.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadLordWeapon_Disassemble_Name_0X1F5E0
StringTable.String: Dismantle for resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreadLordWeapon_Disassemble_Effect_Desc_0X1F5E0
StringTable.String: Disassemble the weapon and sell the obtained resources on the galactic market.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorLifeDevice_Name_0X1F6FB
StringTable.String: Arnor's Legacy

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorLifeDevice_Desc_0X1F6FB
StringTable.String: Our flagship has stumbled upon an artifact of the ancient Arnor civilization. It is a device with the stunning capability to transform lifeless worlds into habitable ones. Should we preserve it or harvest it for parts?

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorLifeDevice_Bonus_Name_0X1F6FB
StringTable.String: Preserve the past.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorLifeDevice_Bonus_Desc_0X1F6FB
StringTable.String: Take the artifact. Store it in our vaults. We may find a world worthy of its power.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorLifeDevice_Disassemble_Name_0X1F6FB
StringTable.String: Profit from the past.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArnorLifeDevice_Disassemble_Effect_Desc_0X1F6FB
StringTable.String: Break down the artifact and sell its components. Let's profit from this ancient technology.

StringTable.Label: Event_NaniteWarship_Name_0X1F7AC
StringTable.String: The Nanite Warship Maker

StringTable.Label: Event_NaniteWarship_Desc_0X1F7AC
StringTable.String: Our flagship has discovered an artifact from an unknown, long-gone civilization. Inside, we found sophisticated Nanites capable of assembling a powerful, automated warship. Do we harness this power, or do we disassemble it for profit?

StringTable.Label: Event_NaniteWarship_Bonus_Name_0X1F7AC
StringTable.String: Command a warship.

StringTable.Label: Event_NaniteWarship_Bonus_Desc_0X1F7AC
StringTable.String: Preserve the artifact. The potential of commanding an ancient warship could shift the balance of power in our favor.

StringTable.Label: Event_NaniteWarship_Disassemble_Name_0X1F7AC
StringTable.String: Harvest for resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_NaniteWarship_Disassemble_Effect_Desc_0X1F7AC
StringTable.String: Disassemble the artifact and sell its Nanite components. Such advanced technology could fetch a high price on the interstellar market.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_Name_0x4A2B
StringTable.String: A lost but now found Survey Module

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_Dec_0x4A2B
StringTable.String: Our flagship has stumbled upon a lost cargo container drifting through space. It's marked with several unfamiliar alien symbols and we suspect it might contain some valuable contents. Inside, we find a survey module, one of the rarest items we know of. Survey modules are what make a flagship a "Flagship" in that they contain a vast array of specialized tools and sensors for dealing with the anomalies that litter the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_Choice1_Name_0x4A2B
StringTable.String: Take the survey module.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_Choice1_Dec_0x4A2B
StringTable.String: This component will be available at our shipyard when we design a new survey ship.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_Choice2_Name_0x4A2B
StringTable.String: Mine it for resources, who knows what's inside.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_Choice3_Name_0x4A2B
StringTable.String: Sell the whole mystery box. Let someone else deal with it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_0x4A2C_Name
StringTable.String: The Cosmic Needler

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_0x4A2C_Dec
StringTable.String: Our flagship has stumbled across a curious sight. A drifting Precursor cargo container. An intense sense of excitement fills the bridge as we approach. Initial scans indicate the container houses an advanced particle beam that is remarkably small even if not particularly powerful. The component is filled with a high concentration of Promethium.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_0x4A2C_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Send the component to our shipyards.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_0x4A2C_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: This component will be available for our next flagship design. The engineers are already brimming with ideas.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_0x4A2C_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Extract the Promethium. We could always use more resources.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FoundCargoContainer_0x4A2C_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the lot on the Galactic Market. In hard credits we trust!

StringTable.Label: Quest_RareArtifact_0x9F8D_Name
StringTable.String: The Enigma of Hyperspace

StringTable.Label: Quest_RareArtifact_0x9F8D_Dec
StringTable.String: Our flagship has detected an ancient cargo container, drifting aimlessly in the void. This appears to be a relic from the Precursor Wars! Inside we find a fully intact Arnorian Drive system, a ship component that is remarkably small for its size. It could be attached to a ship to increase its speed. Alternatively, we could harvest a significant quantity of Thulium from it or sell it to the highest bidder. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_RareArtifact_0x9F8D_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Send the Precursor drive back home.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RareArtifact_0x9F8D_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: This drive will be available when we design a new ship.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RareArtifact_0x9F8D_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Harvest it for valuable resources.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RareArtifact_0x9F8D_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Gain 2 Thulium for use in various advanced technologies.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RareArtifact_0x9F8D_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the artifact on the Galactic Market.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RareArtifact_0x9F8D_Choice3_Dec
StringTable.String: Earn 600 credits from interested buyers across the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AbandonedSlipstreamAccelerator_0x5F2C_Name
StringTable.String: The Phantom Accelerator

StringTable.Label: Quest_AbandonedSlipstreamAccelerator_0x5F2C_Dec
StringTable.String: While cruising through the void, your ship picks up an unexpected signal - a lost cargo container floating aimlessly. Upon closer inspection, it contains a Slipstream Accelerator, an essential component for FTL travel! It's like finding a Ferrari engine at a yard sale.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AbandonedSlipstreamAccelerator_0x5F2C_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Awesome. We can use this on one of our fleets.

StringTable.Label: AbandonedSlipstreamAccelerator_0x5F2C_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: Put this in our Artifact Vault to be used on one of our fleets later.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AbandonedSlipstreamAccelerator_0x5F2C_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Let's dismantle it for some precious Elerium.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AbandonedSlipstreamAccelerator_0x5F2C_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Elerium is a rare and valuable resource. It might not be as exciting as a Slipstream Accelerator but Elerium is pretty nice too.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AbandonedSlipstreamAccelerator_0x5F2C_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell it for a good sum of credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AbandonedSlipstreamAccelerator_0x5F2C_Choice3_Dec
StringTable.String: It's an old saying that one man's space trash is another man's space treasure.

StringTable.Label: Event_SurveyModule_Name_0X2D5E
StringTable.String: Lost Cargo - Survey Module

StringTable.Label: Event_SurveyModule_Dec_0X2D5E
StringTable.String: Your ship has stumbled upon a cargo hold lost in the vastness of space. It contains an advanced Survey Module, possibly from an ancient civilization. This module could be used to give an existing ship the ability to investigate anomalies. Alternatively, it can be broken down into valuable antimatter or sold for credits.

StringTable.Label: Event_SurveyModule_Store_Name_0X2D5E
StringTable.String: Store the survey module in our vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_SurveyModule_Store_Desc_0X2D5E
StringTable.String: We will be able to make an existing ship able to survey anomalies.

StringTable.Label: Event_SurveyModule_BreakDown_Name_0X2D5E
StringTable.String: Break down the survey module for its components.

StringTable.Label: Event_SurveyModule_Sell_Name_0X2D5E
StringTable.String: Sell the survey module for credits.

StringTable.Label: Event_SurveyModule_Sell_Desc_0X2D5E
StringTable.String: Convert the survey module into a substantial amount of credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEnergyWeapon_0x5C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Energy Weapon Discovery

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEnergyWeapon_0x5C2B_Desc
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports the discovery of a lost cargo container floating in space. Upon inspection, a mysterious energy weapon is found inside. The weapon appears to be of unknown origin and technology, with the potential to be a powerful asset.

StringTable.Label: Event_EnergyWeapon_Store_Name_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: Store the energy weapon in the vault for future use.

StringTable.Label: Event_EnergyWeapon_Store_Desc_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: You decide to store the energy weapon in your vault for future use. This mysterious device could prove to be a game-changer in your civilization's defense or offense strategies. Or not. In either event you can install it on one of your ships and find out.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEnergyWeapon_0x5C2B_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the energy weapon for credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostMissileWeapon_0x5C2A_Name
StringTable.String: Mysterious Missile Cache

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostMissileWeapon_0x5C2A_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports the discovery of a lost cargo container floating in space. Upon inspection, it contains an advanced missile weapon prototype. The device is unlike anything seen before, and its origin remains a mystery. It could be used to add missile weapons to one of our ships.

StringTable.Label: Event_MissileWeapon_Store_Name_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: Store the missile weapon in our vault for later use.

StringTable.Label: Event_MissileWeapon_Store_Desc_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: Keep the advanced missile weapon prototype in our vault allowing it to be installed on a ship later.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostMissileWeapon_0x5C2A_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the missile weapon for credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostKineticWeapon_0x5C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Kinetic Weapon

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostKineticWeapon_0x5C2B_Desc
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports the discovery of a mysterious cargo container floating in space. Upon inspection, it contains an advanced kinetic weapon of unknown origin. It is some sort of self-replicating mass-driver. It could be a valuable addition to your arsenal or sold for credits.

StringTable.Label: Event_KineticWeapon_Store_Name_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: Store the weapon in our vault for later use.

StringTable.Label: Event_KineticWeapon_Store_Desc_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: You decide to keep the weapon, storing it in your vault for future use. Its advanced technology may help one of your ships survive a battle.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostKineticWeapon_0x5C2B_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the weapon for credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TacticalThrusterUpgrade_0x5E3C_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Cargo: Tactical Thruster Upgrade

StringTable.Label: Quest_TacticalThrusterUpgrade_0x5E3C_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports the discovery of a drifting cargo container in deep space. Upon inspection, it contains a highly advanced tactical thruster upgrade device, seemingly lost by another civilization. This thruster could be added to one of our ships making it be able to get into firing range faster, a possibly critical advantage.

StringTable.Label: Event_TacticalThrusterUpgrade_Store_Name_0X3F7A
StringTable.String: Store the device in the vault for later use.

StringTable.Label: Event_TacticalThrusterUpgrade_Store_Desc_0X3F7A
StringTable.String: You decide to secure the newly discovered tactical thruster upgrade device in your vault, for future research and potential implementation into your fleet. This could provide a significant advantage over your adversaries in future conflicts.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TacticalThrusterUpgrade_0x5E3C_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the device for credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEngineUpgradeModule_0x5C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Engine Upgrade Module

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEngineUpgradeModule_0x5C2B_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship's captain reports the discovery of a lost cargo container floating in space. Upon investigation, it appears to contain a rare and valuable engine upgrade module that can increase a ship's speed through Hyperspace. The captain awaits your orders on how to proceed with this discovery.

StringTable.Label: Event_EngineUpgradeModule_Store_Name_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: Store the module in our vault for future use.

StringTable.Label: Event_EngineUpgradeModule_Store_Desc_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: Bring the engine upgrade module back to our civilization's vault for safekeeping and potential future use. Add to one of your ships to increase its speed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEngineUpgradeModule_0x5C2B_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the module for credits

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPollutionRemoverModule_0x4C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Atmospheric Filter

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPollutionRemoverModule_0x4C2B_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports the discovery of a mysterious cargo container floating in the void. Upon inspection, it contains an advanced Pollution Remover Module of unknown origin. It filters out the pollutants in the atmosphere. The deciphered writing is from the container indicates that it was 'too expensive' and was being returned. This device could be a valuable asset in maintaining planetary ecosystems or sold for a tidy profit.

StringTable.Label: Event_PollutionRemoverModule_Store_Name_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: Store the module in the vault for later use.

StringTable.Label: Event_PollutionRemoverModule_Store_Desc_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: Secure the Pollution Remover Module in your vault, allowing it to be used on one of our various despoiled worlds. You, obviously being the despoiler in this scenario. This device could help give the illusion you care about the ecosystems of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPollutionRemoverModule_0x4C2B_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell out for money.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostArmorModule_0x7C3D_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Armor Module

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostArmorModule_0x7C3D_Desc
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports the discovery of a lost cargo container drifting in space. Inside, they found a mysterious and advanced armor module that can be applied to a starship. It seems to be of great value, but its true potential is yet to be unlocked.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArmorModule_Store_Name_0X5A7F
StringTable.String: Store the Armor Module in our vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArmorModule_Store_Desc_0X5A7F
StringTable.String: Store the armor module in your vault and keep it for future use. Its potential may prove invaluable in future engagements, providing increased protection to a target ship.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostArmorModule_0x7C3D_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the Armor Module.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPlanetaryBroadcaster_0x4C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Planetary Broadcaster

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPlanetaryBroadcaster_0x4C2B_Desc
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports the discovery of a lost cargo container floating in space. Upon further inspection, it appears to contain an ancient, yet functional Planetary Broadcaster device. The device is intended to send out a one-time burst of entertainment related information across a wide area. If it were used on a planet, it would greatly increase the planet's influence.

StringTable.Label: Event_PlanetaryBroadcaster_Store_Name_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: Store the Planetary Broadcaster in the vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_PlanetaryBroadcaster_Store_Desc_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: Deciding to keep the device, you store the planetary broadcaster in your vault for future use. Apply it to a planet that is struggling against foreign influence for best results.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPlanetaryBroadcaster_0x4C2B_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the Planetary Broadcaster for credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPlanetaryCultureModule_0x4C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Planetary Culture Module

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPlanetaryCultureModule_0x4C2B_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports the discovery of a mysterious cargo container floating in space. Upon opening it, the crew finds an ancient device that upon study appears to have a vast catalog of the cultural significance of every planet in the galaxy. This is a remarkable treasure. Unfortunately, the device is obviously very old and likely only able to be used once. It could be used to increase the cultural value of any planet we choose.

StringTable.Label: Event_PlanetaryCultureModule_Store_Name_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: Store the Planetary Culture Module for later use.

StringTable.Label: Event_PlanetaryCultureModule_Store_Desc_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: Deciding to keep the Planetary Culture Module for your civilization, you store it in your vault. Its potential to shape the cultural identity of entire planets could prove to be a valuable asset in your future endeavors. It will increase the base cultural significance of the planet you choose.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPlanetaryCultureModule_0x4C2B_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Dissemble the module and sell the components for money.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PlanetaryDefenseModule_0x8F3C_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Planetary Defense Module

StringTable.Label: Quest_PlanetaryDefenseModule_0x8F3C_Desc
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports discovering a lost cargo container adrift in space. Upon inspection, the container houses an advanced Planetary Defense Module, believed to be from a long-forgotten civilization. This mysterious device could prove invaluable to your empire by increasing a given planet's defense capabilities against invasion.

StringTable.Label: Event_PlanetaryDefenseModule_Store_Name_0X4E7A
StringTable.String: Store the defense module in the vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_PlanetaryDefenseModule_Store_Desc_0X4E7A
StringTable.String: Storing this Planetary Defense Module in your vault could provide invaluable protection to your empire's planets in times of conflict. Its advanced technology could potentially prevent a planet from being invaded.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PlanetaryDefenseModule_0x8F3C_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Sell it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEnemyDestablizerModule_0x4C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Enemy Destabilizer Module

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEnemyDestablizerModule_0x4C2B_Desc
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports the discovery of a lost cargo container floating in space. This device appears to be able to be quietly slipped into orbit of an enemy planet raising that planet's crime rate. A very devious device indeed.

StringTable.Label: Event_EnemyDestablizerModule_Store_Name_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: Store the Enemy Destabilizer Module.

StringTable.Label: Event_EnemyDestablizerModule_Store_Desc_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: Choose to store the Enemy Destabilizer Module in your vault. Crime is bad except when it's happening to people you don't like. This device will increase the crime rate of any planet you choose.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEnemyDestablizerModule_0x4C2B_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the Enemy Destabilizer Module

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEnemyDefenseSabotageModule_0x4C1B_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Enemy Defense Sabotage Module

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEnemyDefenseSabotageModule_0x4C1B_Dec
StringTable.String: While exploring the far reaches of space, your flagship stumbles upon a mysterious cargo container. Upon opening it, they discover a highly advanced enemy defense sabotage module. This device permanently reduces an enemy planet's ability to defend against invasion by installing trillions of tiny, self-replicating crystalline orbs that damage the planet's air-based defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Event_EnemyDefenseSabotageModule_Store_Name_0X2D6F
StringTable.String: Store the module in the vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_EnemyDefenseSabotageModule_Store_Desc_0X2D6F
StringTable.String: Deciding that the module could prove useful in future invasions, you order your crew to store it securely in the vault.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostEnemyDefenseSabotageModule_0x4C1B_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the module for credits (after taking it apart)

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPropagandizeModule_0x5C2A_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Propagandize Module

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPropagandizeModule_0x5C2A_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports finding a lost cargo container adrift in space. Upon opening, they discover a sophisticated Propagandize Module capable of swaying enemy citizens' loyalty. The net effect is that it greatly reduces the enemy planet's cultural significance. Will you keep it for future use or sell it for credits?

StringTable.Label: Event_PropagandizeModule_Store_Name_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: Store the Propagandize Module.

StringTable.Label: Event_PropagandizeModule_Store_Desc_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: By keeping the Propagandize Module in your vault, you can use it later to reduce the influence of a target planet.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostPropagandizeModule_0x5C2A_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Take it apart and sell the pieces for money.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PoisonEnemyPlanetModule_0x4C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Cargo: Poisonous Device

StringTable.Label: Quest_PoisonEnemyPlanetModule_0x4C2B_Desc
StringTable.String: Your captain reports discovering a lost cargo container in the depths of space. Inside, they found a highly advanced device capable of poisoning an enemy planet's environment. What should be done with this dangerous technology?

StringTable.Label: Event_PoisonEnemyPlanetModule_Store_Name_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: Store the device in our vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_PoisonEnemyPlanetModule_Store_Desc_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: The device is carefully stored in your civilization's vault, where it remains available for potential future use.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PoisonEnemyPlanetModule_0x4C2B_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Take it apart and sell the pieces for money.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PoisonEnemyPlanetModule_0x4C2B_Choice3_Desc
StringTable.String: Instead of keeping the device, you decide to sell it on the galactic market for a hefty. The buyer remains anonymous, and the device's ultimate destination is unknown. Nonetheless, your civilization's coffers are now filled with valuable currency.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostDepleteResourcesModule_0x5C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Syphoning Resources Module

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostDepleteResourcesModule_0x5C2B_Dec
StringTable.String: As your flagship approaches an abandoned cargo container, it detects an advanced Deplete Resources Module within. This mysterious device has the power to sap the resources of enemy planets. Will you keep this powerful tool or sell it for credits?

StringTable.Label: Event_DepleteResourcesModule_Store_Name_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: Store the Deplete Resources Module in the Vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_DepleteResourcesModule_Store_Desc_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: By storing the Deplete Resources Module in your vault, you gain the ability to use its power in the future. This device can be deployed to drain resources from enemy planets, giving you a strategic advantage in conflicts.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LostDepleteResourcesModule_0x5C2B_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the Deplete Resources components for money.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FriendlyPlanetMineralScanner_0x5C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Mysterious Cargo: Advanced Mineral Scanner

StringTable.Label: Quest_FriendlyPlanetMineralScanner_0x5C2B_Dec
StringTable.String: Your captain reports finding a lost cargo container adrift in space. Inside, they discovered an advanced mineral scanner, a device capable of accurately detecting valuable resources on distant planets. It can only be used once but it could still be very valuable. This cutting-edge technology could provide a significant advantage.

StringTable.Label: Event_FriendlyPlanetMineralScanner_Store_Name_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: Store the Mineral Scanner in our vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_FriendlyPlanetMineralScanner_Store_Desc_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: By storing the advanced mineral scanner in your vault, you can utilize its technology to improve resource detection on our planets.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FriendlyPlanetMineralScanner_0x5C2B_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the Mineral Scanner for credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FriendlyPlanetTechFinderModule_0x5C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Cargo: Friendly Planet Tech Finder

StringTable.Label: Quest_FriendlyPlanetTechFinderModule_0x5C2B_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports encountering a lost cargo container floating in space. After careful examination, it appears to be a device made by a long-lost civilization to find Precursor technology on planets. The device is very old and in poor shape, but it could still be valuable even if it can only be used once. Do you wish to store this device in your vault or sell it for credits?

StringTable.Label: Event_FriendlyPlanetTechFinderModule_Store_Name_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: Store the device in the vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_FriendlyPlanetTechFinderModule_Store_Desc_0X3E6F
StringTable.String: This device will increase the base Tech rating of a target planet.

StringTable.Label: Quest_FriendlyPlanetTechFinderModule_0x5C2B_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the device for credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SummonLeaderModule_0x4C2B_Name
StringTable.String: Found: Summon Synthetic Leader Device

StringTable.Label: Quest_SummonLeaderModule_0x4C2B_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports the discovery of a lost cargo container, floating through the void of space. As your crew investigates, they find a peculiar device inside, emitting a faint yet mesmerizing glow. With a bit of effort, your team realizes that it is an ancient Precursor device for summoning a prototype Yor advisor.

StringTable.Label: Event_SummonLeaderModule_Store_Name_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: Store the device in the vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_SummonLeaderModule_Store_Desc_0X2E6F
StringTable.String: By using this device you will summon an Ancient (but loyal) Yor as a leader you can assign.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SummonLeaderModule_0x4C2B_Choice3_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the device for credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RoboticServantsModule_0x5C2F_Name
StringTable.String: Lost Cargo: Robotic Servants Module

StringTable.Label: Quest_RoboticServantsModule_0x5C2F_Dec
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports the discovery of a lost cargo container floating in space. Upon opening it, they find an advanced Robotic Servants Module - a device capable of significantly improving the efficiency of a planet's workforce. The choice is yours: store it for future use or sell it for credits?

StringTable.Label: Event_RoboticServantsModule_Store_Name_0X3E7F
StringTable.String: Store the Robotic Servants Module.

StringTable.Label: Event_RoboticServantsModule_Store_Desc_0X3E7F
StringTable.String: By storing the Robotic Servants Module in your vault, you can deploy it on one of your planets at a later time, significantly improving workforce efficiency and productivity.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RoboticServantsModule_0x5C2F_Choice4_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the Robotic Servants Module.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RoboticStarDrone_0x5C3D_Name
StringTable.String: Encounter with a Robotic Star Drone

StringTable.Label: Quest_RoboticStarDrone_0x5C3D_Desc
StringTable.String: Your flagship captain reports discovering a lost cargo container floating in the void. Upon opening, they reveal a mysterious robotic star drone with advanced technological capabilities. When this drone is deployed, it acts as a small but lethal ship in battle. This could prove useful or profitable.

StringTable.Label: Event_RoboticStarDrone_Store_Name_0X3F7C
StringTable.String: Store the drone in our vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_RoboticStarDrone_Store_Desc_0X3F7C
StringTable.String: By storing the drone, you can analyze its advanced technology and integrate it into your fleet, potentially boosting your fleet's capabilities in future engagements.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RoboticStarDrone_0x5C3D_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the drone for credits.
